mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_content, m_idx, admin_idx, qna_idx) values (#{reply_content}, #{m_idx}, #{admin_idx}, #{qna_idx})
mapper.select:
SELECT reply_idx, date_format(reply_regdate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS reply_regdate, ad.admin_nm
FROM admin ad JOIN reply re ON ad.admin_idx=re.admin_idx WHERE re.qna_idx=#{arg0}

SELECT r.reply_content, r.reply_regdate, r.reply_editdate, r.m_idx, ad.admin_nm, q.qna_title FROM reply r join qna q join admin ad ON r.qna_idx=q.qna_idx AND r.admin_idx=ad.admin_idx WHERE r.reply_idx=#{arg0}
